Madison, WI - (REMOTE possible) Circuit - http://circuitapp.co

Github for hardware. Circuit is a social tool for designing and building electronic projects aimed at the exploding Maker/hobbyist market. We're going to disrupt hardware with a tool that makes things 10x easier & faster. Launching Q1 2012.

We are looking for a passionate all-around programmer, experienced with creating advanced frontend interfaces as well as backend systems. Mainly would be doing a large amount of challenging HTML5, Javascript, and using PHP (Cake) & MySQL on the backend. Big bonus points if you have graphics programming experience and hardware background: microcontrollers, designing PCBs, tearing things apart, and familiarity with the Maker movement.

Interested, questions? jobs@circuitapp.co
